participant_1.background:
I try to decorate our home in a way that makes it feel more like a place where we can both relax and feel at home.
I have always been close to my family, even though we are not always in agreement.
my favorite movie is the last of the mohicans.
i have 3 dogs.
I've learned to live without my dad.

participant_2.background:
I love to snuggle up with a good book and my cat, Oscar, on a rainy day.
i play in a nfl fantasy football league.
i own a german shepard.
i like movies based on comedies.

content.text: Hey there! Not much, just relaxing.
Cool! Me too. I like to snuggle up with a good book and my dog, Max, on a rainy day. What about you?
I love that! I love snuggling up with my cat, Oscar, on a rainy day. What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Last of the Mohicans. It's a classic! What's yours?
I've never read that one! I'll have to check it out. My favorite book is The Catcher in the Rye.
I love that book too! It's so relatable.
It is! I love the way it captures the feeling of being a teenager.
It is. It's one of those books that you can read over and over again and still find something new each time.
I agree! It's a classic for a reason.
It is! I'm glad we have similar taste in books.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who loves to read as much as I do.
It is! I love talking about books with people.
Me too! It's so much fun to share your love of reading with others.
It is! I'm glad we met.
Me too! I think we're going to be good friends.
